Save Changes Before Closing? Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

If you select File»Close before saving your VI, LabVIEW displays the Save changes before closing? dialog box. This dialog box serves as a warning that the VI is about to leave memory and that any unsaved changes will be lost. Click List Unsaved Changes to display the Explain Changes dialog box.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Save—Save changes now.
  • Don't Save—Remove from memory without saving.
  • Cancel—Cancel the close operation.
